posts.message: I'm now convinced that Chrome Sucks! Specially garbage collection. when you remove an element from the DOM it doesn't clear the memory of this element at once/at all. try to make a simple page with 3 iFrames and see the memory usage. then destroy all the dom of the page and notice the same memory usage if not increasing for this tab!
anyone here has a Themeforst Account? need help passing the Questionnaire :D

posts.message:
Negotiation skills for geeks: how to make them say "yes" 100% of the time?

Take an axe to the meeting,
and cut the head of the first person you meet, 
then ask them politely "I want to do XYZ"

WOW, must read for software pirates ;)

posts.caption: greenheartgames.com
posts.description: When we released our very first game, Game Dev Tycoon (for Mac, Windows and Linux) yesterday, we did something unusual and as far as I know unique. We released a cracked version of the game ourselves, minutes after opening our Store.

posts.caption: umbraco.com
posts.description: During one of our regular security audits of the core, a severe security vulnerability was found in the integration web services of Umbraco and we recommend everyone to take immediate action to prevent any exploit.
